message:
Add voice persona inspiration system with floating bubble UI

- Transform writing suggestion into inspiration system
- Randomly select voice persona to deliver encouragement
- Display inspiration in floating bubble with icon and voice name
- Backend generates context-aware inspiration messages
- Frontend shows bubble bottom-right with close button
